specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Cire Cire finishing is a process that produces a smooth and glossy surface on fabrics by applying a water-repellent agent and subjecting them to heat and pressure. This high-gloss treatment not only enhances the fabricâ€™s sheen but also contributes to improved wind resistance and water repellency.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Performance Windproof Windproof is a function that blocks wind from passing through and helps retain body heat. Recommended Use Activewear, Windbreakers, Nylon Shorts
